Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
95 Sanidassanattika, Saraṇaduka
Sanidassanattika, Saraṇaduka
146.
346Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ saraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  avigate cha.
347Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ araṇaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho naaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
348(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
147.
349Sanidassanasappaṭigho araṇo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naaraṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
350Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye purejāte nava, vippayutte tīṇi…pe…  avigate nava.
351(Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ, evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
<< 94 Sanidassanattika, Sauttaradukaup
